text: The Alfa Romeo 128 is an Italian piston aircraft engine made Alfa Romeo. It was commonly used in World War II aircraft. == Variants == * Alfa 128 R.C.18 * Alfa 128 R.C.21 == Users == * Fiat G.12 * Savoia-Marchetti SM.75 Marsupiale * Savoia-Marchetti S.M.79 Sparviero * Savoia-Marchetti S.M.79B Sparviero * Savoia-Marchetti S.M.82 Canguru * Savoia-Marchetti S.M.84 * Savoia-Marchetti S.M.95 Category:Italian aircraft
title: Alfa Romeo 128
